summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of 'Create New Proposal' flow in Creator Dashboard. All 14 features tested and working correctly. The 4-step proposal creation flow (Form → Review → ARRIS Analysis → Completion) is fully functional with real AI integration.
passed_tests: New Proposal button visible in dashboard header (data-testid='new-proposal-btn')
New Proposal button in 'My Proposals' tab sidebar (data-testid='new-proposal-list-btn')
New Proposal modal opens when clicking the button (data-testid='new-proposal-modal')
Proposal form has all required fields: title (data-testid='input-title'), description (data-testid='input-description'), goals (data-testid='input-goals')
Platform selection toggles work correctly (12 platforms: YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, Twitter/X, LinkedIn, Podcast, Blog/Website, Newsletter, Twitch, Patreon/Membership, Online Courses, Other)
Timeline dropdown works correctly with options: 1-2 Weeks, 2-4 Weeks, 1-2 Months, 3-6 Months, 6-12 Months, Ongoing/No Fixed End
Priority dropdown works correctly with options: Low, Medium, High, Critical
ARRIS intake question field present (data-testid='input-arris-question') with dynamic question from API
Form validation: Continue button disabled when title < 3 chars or description < 10 chars
Continue button creates draft proposal and moves to review step (Step 2)
Review step displays all proposal details correctly (title, description, goals, platforms, timeline, priority)
Submit for ARRIS Review triggers AI analysis with loading state (Step 3 - 'ARRIS is analyzing your proposal...')
Completion step shows proposal ID and ARRIS summary (Step 4 - 'Proposal Submitted!')
Clicking 'View in My Proposals' closes modal and refreshes list
New proposal appears in proposals list after creation (verified: Test Proposal 865674)
Draft proposals can be viewed in proposals list (verified: TikTok Growth Strategy 2026, Test Proposal 234c137f)
Submitted proposals show ARRIS insights in detail view (summary, complexity, strengths, risks, recommendations, suggested milestones)
Proposal count updates correctly in tab (My Proposals (7))
Status timeline visible in proposal detail (Submitted → Review → Approved → Complete)
seed_data_creation: Created test proposal 'Test Proposal 865674' (ID: PP-627e5b30) with ARRIS insights during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: New Proposal flow is fully functional. The modal has 4 steps: 1) Form entry with all fields (title, description, goals, platforms, timeline, priority, ARRIS intake question), 2) Review step showing all details, 3) ARRIS analysis loading state, 4) Completion with proposal ID and ARRIS summary. All data-testid attributes are properly set for testing. ARRIS analysis uses real AI integration (not mocked) and takes 3-5 seconds. Test creator has 7 proposals total including drafts and submitted proposals with ARRIS insights.
